resources.string: Connection is a go! Welcome to KPS Connect!
No connection detected. The app needs a working internet connection to function. Press OK to exit.
This section is still WIP, check back later!

KPS Connect is the dream child of Manika Pal, coded by hobbyist programmer Harsh Shandilya, better known as MSF Jarvis. It is a means to connect to the school, an easily accessible one, giving you one click access to the school blog, website, and handy forms to provide feedback for the app, and the school itself.
Jeff Corcoran : XDA Labs dev and awesome friend
Danijel Markov : Creator of L Speed Mod
Oops! That failed. Please send a bug report describing what caused it using the option in the navdrawer
